actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 924 of title 18 to increase the penalties for certain offenses relating to firearms, and to provide minimum penalties in certain circumstances.

summary.text: Increases the penalty for unlawfully carrying a firearm during the commission of any felony from not less than one year nor more than ten years to a term of not less than two years nor more than twenty-five years. Prohibits the suspension of a sentence of a person convicted under this Act. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 924)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 924 of title 18 to increase the penalties for certain offenses relating to firearms, and to provide minimum penalties in certain circumstances.
